          <title>
            <string language="sl">Grški bogovi, epi in miti</string>
            <string language="en">Gods of ancient Greece, myths</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Götter von altem Griechenland, Mythen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dieux de la Grèce antique, mythes</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zbirka trditev o starogrških bogovih in mitih.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of true/false statements about the gods and myths of ancient Greece.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">grški bogovi</string>
            <string language="en">greeks gods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung true/false Anweisungen über die 
Götter und die Mythen von altem Griechenland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de rapports de true/false au sujet des
dieux et des mythes de la Grèce antique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção de indicações de true/false sobre os 
deuses e os mitos de Greece antigo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle istruzione di true/false 
circa i dii ed i miti della Grecia antica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των αληθινών/ψεύτικων δηλώσεων για τους Θεούς
και τους μύθους της αρχαίας Ελλάδας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de declaraciones de true/false sobre 
los dioses y los mitos de Grecia antigua.</string>
          </description>
